name: Sweet Story Neko
description:
Two forest cats live in the deep forest. The singing of birds, the sound of wind and water, became their home. You can be a part of their romantic friendship, so join them.

Press "Ctrl + F" to get an easy win
or you can win by yourself to get a special hardcore achievement.



Sweet Story Neko is a puzzle game in which you must collect all pairs of pictures to reproduce the image.

Artist - https://www.instagram.com/andrzej.zi/

Enjoy lush pictures, great music, and leisurely gameplay with Neko.
